Class Recommender

  • Object
    • Recommender

  • public class Recommender
extends Object
    The class is the core of the recommender system.

    • Method Detail

      • setTrainPath

        public void setTrainPath(String s)
        Set libFM training file path to s. Call this function before calling run().
        Parameters:
        s - The libFM training file path.

      • setTestPath

        public void setTestPath(String s)
        Set libFM testing file path to s. Call this function before calling run().
        Parameters:
        s - The libFM testing file path.

      • setPredictionPath

        public void setPredictionPath(String s)
        Set libFM output file path to s. Call this function before calling run().
        Parameters:
        s - The libFM output file path.

      • run

        public List<Double> run()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Run libFM for recommendation. First, the command used to call libFM is built. Then, this command is executed with a ProcessBuilder object.
        Returns:
        The List of predicted ratings for items in testFilePath.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any of the required files are not properly specified.
        RuntimeException - if some other error occurs during the execution of libFM.

      • parsePredictionFile

        public List<Double> parsePredictionFile(java.nio.file.Path p)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Parse libFM output file, return the predictions as a List of Doubles.
        Parameters:
        p - The libFM output file path to read from.
        Returns:
        The prediction results.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fails to read the prediction file.

      • getRecommendationList

        public List<String> getRecommendationList(String user,
                                          String category,
                                          int N)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Get the top-N recommendation item list for a given user. The returned list will only contain the unseen items for the user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        category - The category name.
        N - Only the top-N items will be returned.
        Returns:
        A List of item IDs, sorted according to the predicted ratings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fails to read or write a file.

      • getRecommendationList
